page.title: 14The school bus driver.
page.content: Every day after each journey Henry cleans his bus.He takes pupils to school.He takes people shopping,and people to work.The colours on the bus are white,pink and maroon.His first disaster was when he was coming through Little Somerford and he skidded on the road and somebody stopped in the middle of the road with a horse box on the back of a land rover.The whole of one side panel was torn from the bus.Fortunately no one was injured. Henry has been a bus driver for 3 years,before that he worked as a cowman.The bus runs on diesel.Everything is now calibrated in litres and kilomiters. His bus does about 3 kilometres to 1 litre of diesel.Henry enjoys his work.Bus driving is more comfortable than working out in all weathers,but he says cows were lovely animals to work.
